verses.verse: In the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> in the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> to <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7597>Shealtiel,<s%> <S%H6346>governor<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Josedech,<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>speaks<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H6256>time<s%> is not <S%H935>come,<s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> should be <S%H1129>built.<s%>
Then <S%H1961>came<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
Is it <S%H6256>time<s%> for you, O you, to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in your <S%H5603>paneled<s%> <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> lie <S%H2720>waste?<s%>

You have <S%H2232>sown<s%> <S%H7235>much,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> in <S%H4592>little;<s%> you <S%H398>eat,<s%> but you have not <S%H7654>enough;<s%> you <S%H8354>drink,<s%> but you are not filled with <S%H7937>drink;<s%> you <S%H3847>clothe<s%> you, but there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H2527>warm;<s%> and he that <S%H7936>earns<s%> <S%H7936>wages<s%> <S%H7936>earns<s%> <S%H7936>wages<s%> to put it <S%H413>into<s%> a <S%H6872>bag<s%> with <S%H5344>holes.<s%>

<S%H5927>Go<s%> up to the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house;<s%> and I will take <S%H7521>pleasure<s%> in it, and I will be <S%H3513>glorified,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

You <S%H6437>looked<s%> for <S%H7235>much,<s%> and, see <S%H2009><s%>it came to <S%H4592>little;<s%> and when you <S%H935>brought<s%> it <S%H1004>home,<s%> I did <S%H5301>blow<s%> on it. <S%H3282>Why?<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> of my <S%H1004>house<s%> that is <S%H2720>waste,<s%> and you <S%H7323>run<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his own <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you is <S%H3607>stayed<s%> from <S%H2919>dew,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H3607>stayed<s%> from her <S%H2981>fruit.<s%>

And I <S%H7121>called<s%> for a <S%H2721>drought<s%> on the <S%H776>land,<s%> and on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and on the <S%H1715>corn,<s%> and on the <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and on the <S%H3323>oil,<s%> and on that <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> <S%H3318>brings<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and on <S%H120>men,<s%> and on <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3018>labor<s%> of the <S%H3709>hands.<s%>

Then <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7597>Shealtiel,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Josedech,<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> him, and the <S%H5971>people<s%> did <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Then <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H4397>messenger<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H4400>message<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> I am with you, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5782>stirred<s%> up the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7597>Shealtiel,<s%> <S%H6346>governor<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Josedech,<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people;<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%>

In the <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
